contexts.context: ...In the history of Art,unlike the history of <mark>Science</mark>,no genuine work of art is made obsolete by...
...art is made obsolete by a later work. Past <mark>science</mark> is of interest only to the historian of science...
...science is of interest only to the historian of <mark>science</mark>,not to what scientists are doing at this moment...
